Class MetaData

java.lang.Object
ORM.MetaData
public final class MetaData
extends java.lang.Object

static MetaData class

class for all kinds of metadata extraction, handling, manipulation, etc... .

    • buildTableName

      public static java.lang.String buildTableName​(java.lang.String name)

      Method buildTableName

      Little helper function to get normed table names.
      Parameters:
      name - Simple name of class without @Table Annotation or empty tableName
      Returns:
      String construct of "t_" + class name in lower case.

    • toColumnType

      public static java.lang.Object toColumnType​(Field field, java.lang.Object object)

      Method toColumnType

      traverses custom Classes for foreign key types and converts LocalDate to SQL.Date.
      Parameters:
      field - the field as argument for entity access.
      object - the field as object for value returning.
      Returns:
      Either a new object with a "simple" type, a SQL.Date object or the original object if it was simple enough.
